doc.title: Pro Beach Hockey
doc.plot: ESPN's made-for-television beach sports/sex appeal/rock 'n' roll summertime show featured roller hockey games, dancer cheerleaders, and rock bands at the beach. Former Raiderettes Brooke Morales, Gretchen Stockdale, Kelli Brook, and Paige Green were among the show's "Jammin' Dancers", probably the highlight of the show's first season.
